name: CW-24 auto-magazine
description: An advanced automagazine for the CW-24 rifle.  Like the SVS magazines, it uses microrobotics to load its cartridges.

name: CW-24 extended magazine
description: An extended auto-magazine for the CW-24 rifle.  Like the SVS magazines, it uses microrobotics to load its cartridges.

name: CWD-63 extended magazine
description: A cheap 10-round box magazine for the CWD-63.  It's not as reliable.

name: CWD-63 magazine
description: Since it's created for the .308 round, it doesn't need the curved shape of the original magazine.

name: SVS-24 robodrum
description: An advanced 135-round drum magazine.  Like the auto-magazine, it loads cartridges using microrobotics.

name: SVS-24 robomag
description: An advanced 42-round auto-magazine.  Unlike previous generations of magazines, this one uses microrobotics to load cartridges.
